sourcesContent:
album-photos works!

{{photo.tittle}}

import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {photo} from "../products"; import {AlbumService} from "../album.service"; import {ActivatedRoute} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-album-photos', templateUrl: './album-photos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./album-photos.component.css'] }) export class AlbumPhotosComponent { photos: photo[] constructor(private route:ActivatedRoute,private albumService:AlbumService) { this.photos = []; } ngOnInit(){ this.getPhotos() } getPhotos(){ this.route.paramMap.subscribe((param)=>{ const id = Number(param.get('id')) this.albumService.getPhotos(id).subscribe((album)=>{ this.photos = album }) }) } }
